biotools.summary: PBGI is an effective approach and automatic bioinformatics pipeline for bacterial genome identification, performing automatedly and customized bioinformatics analysis using short-reads or long-reads sequencing data produced by multiple platforms such as Illumina, PacBio and Oxford Nanopore.
